definition: being one more than seven, one of four playing cards in a deck with eight pips on the face
details:
adjective
- being one more than seven
= synonyms: viii
noun
- one of four playing cards in a deck with eight pips on the face
= synonyms: eight-spot
- the cardinal number that is the sum of seven and one
= synonyms: octet, eighter, eighter from Decatur, octad, ogdoad, octonary
